name: The Unfaithful Storyteller
description:
The Unfaithful Storyteller

The son of a father want to know the story about what happened to their grandpa, after realizing they haven't seen eachother for quite a while. The father will try and remember the story and it's up to you to shape father's story in the way you want.

Grandpa used to be a freedom fighter for a group in the past, he got into jail for rebelling against the government. Shape father's story about grandpa's time in jail

The game is a 2D action platformer with different variations of enemies and weapons. Choose weapons depending on the situation

Controls: arrow keys to move, Z to shoot/interact.

Music made by https://patrickdearteaga.com/

Sound effects taken from freesounds
